00052 /* Config Vars EDIT FORM */
00053 /* Config Vars update process */
00054 if (isset($_POST['updateData'])) {
00055     // reset/truncate setting table content
00056     $dbs->query('TRUNCATE TABLE setting');
00057     // library name
00058     $library_name = $dbs->escape_string(strip_tags(trim($_POST['library_name'])));
00059     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'library_name\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($library_name)).'\')');
00060 
00061     // library subname
00062     $library_subname = $dbs->escape_string(strip_tags(trim($_POST['library_subname'])));
00063     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'library_subname\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($library_subname)).'\')');
00064 
00065     // initialize template arrays
00066     $template = array('theme' => $sysconf['template']['theme'], 'css' => $sysconf['template']['css']);
00067     $admin_template = array('theme' => $sysconf['admin_template']['theme'], 'css' => $sysconf['admin_template']['css']);
00068 
00069     // template
00070     $template['theme'] = $_POST['template'];
00071     $template['css'] = str_replace($sysconf['template']['theme'], $template['theme'], $sysconf['template']['css']);
00072     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'template\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($template)).'\')');
00073 
00074     // admin template
00075     $admin_template['theme'] = $_POST['admin_template'];
00076     $admin_template['css'] = str_replace($sysconf['admin_template']['theme'], $admin_template['theme'], $sysconf['admin_template']['css']);
00077     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'admin_template\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($admin_template)).'\')');
00078 
00079     // language
00080     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'default_lang\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($_POST['default_lang'])).'\')');
00081 
00082     // opac num result
00083     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'opac_result_num\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($_POST['opac_result_num'])).'\')');
00084 
00085     // promoted titles in homepage
00086     if (isset($_POST['enable_promote_titles'])) {
00087         $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'enable_promote_titles\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($_POST['enable_promote_titles'])).'\')');
00088     }
00089 
00090     // quick return
00091     $quick_return = $_POST['quick_return'] == '1'?true:false;
00092     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'quick_return\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($quick_return)).'\')');
00093 
00094     // loan and due date manual change
00095     $allow_loan_date_change = $_POST['allow_loan_date_change'] == '1'?true:false;
00096     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'allow_loan_date_change\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($allow_loan_date_change)).'\')');
00097 
00098     // loan limit override
00099     $loan_limit_override = $_POST['loan_limit_override'] == '1'?true:false;
00100     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'loan_limit_override\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($loan_limit_override)).'\')');
00101 
00102     // xml detail
00103     $xml_detail = $_POST['enable_xml_detail'] == '1'?true:false;
00104     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'enable_xml_detail\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($xml_detail)).'\')');
00105 
00106     // xml result
00107     $xml_result = $_POST['enable_xml_result'] == '1'?true:false;
00108     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'enable_xml_result\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($xml_result)).'\')');
00109 
00110     // file download
00111     $file_download = $_POST['allow_file_download'] == '1'?true:false;
00112     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'allow_file_download\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($file_download)).'\')');
00113 
00114     // session timeout
00115     $session_timeout = intval($_POST['session_timeout']) >= 1800?$_POST['session_timeout']:1800;
00116     $dbs->query('INSERT INTO setting VALUES (NULL, \'session_timeout\', \''.$dbs->escape_string(serialize($session_timeout)).'\')');
00117 
00118     // write log
00119     utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'system', $_SESSION['realname'].' change application global configuration');
00120     utility::jsAlert(__('Settings saved. Refreshing page'));
00121     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.location.href = \'../../index.php?mod=system\';</script>';
00122 }
00123 /* Config Vars update process end */

00125 // create new instance
00126 $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], 'post');
00127 $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="updateData" value="'.__('Save Settings').'" class="button"';
00128 
00129 // form table attributes
00130 $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00131 $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00132 $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00133 
00134 // load settings from database
00135 utility::loadSettings($dbs);
00136 
00137 // version status
00138 $form->addAnything('Senayan Version', '<strong>'.SENAYAN_VERSION.'</strong>');
00139 
00140 // library name
00141 $form->addTextField('text', 'library_name', __('Library Name'), $sysconf['library_name'], 'style="width: 100%;"');
00142 
00143 // library subname
00144 $form->addTextField('text', 'library_subname', __('Library Subname'), $sysconf['library_subname'], 'style="width: 100%;"');
00145 
00146 /* Form Element(s) */
00147 // public template
00148 // scan template directory
00149 $template_dir = SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.$sysconf['template']['dir'];
00150 $dir = new simbio_directory($template_dir);
00151 $dir_tree = $dir->getDirectoryTree(1);
00152 // sort array by index
00153 ksort($dir_tree);
00154 // loop array
00155 foreach ($dir_tree as $dir) {
00156     $tpl_options[] = array($dir, $dir);
00157 }
00158 $form->addSelectList('template', __('Public Template'), $tpl_options, $sysconf['template']['theme']);
00159 
00160 // admin template
00161 // scan admin template directory
00162 $admin_template_dir = SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'];
00163 $dir = new simbio_directory($admin_template_dir);
00164 $dir_tree = $dir->getDirectoryTree(1);
00165 // sort array by index
00166 ksort($dir_tree);
00167 // loop array
00168 foreach ($dir_tree as $dir) {
00169     $admin_tpl_options[] = array($dir, $dir);
00170 }
00171 $form->addSelectList('admin_template', __('Admin Template'), $admin_tpl_options, $sysconf['admin_template']['theme']);
00172 
00173 // application language
00174 require_once(LANGUAGES_BASE_DIR.'localisation.php');
00175 $form->addSelectList('default_lang', __('Default App. Language'), $available_languages, $sysconf['default_lang']);
00176 
00177 // opac result list number
00178 $result_num_options[] = array('10', '10');
00179 $result_num_options[] = array('20', '20');
00180 $result_num_options[] = array('30', '30');
00181 $result_num_options[] = array('40', '40');
00182 $result_num_options[] = array('40', '50');
00183 $form->addSelectList('opac_result_num', __('Number Of Collections To Show In OPAC Result List'), $result_num_options, $sysconf['opac_result_num'] );
00184 
00185 // homepage setting
00186 $promote_options[] = array('1', 'Yes');
00187 $form->addCheckBox('enable_promote_titles', __('Show Promoted Titles at Homepage'), $promote_options, $sysconf['enable_promote_titles']?'1':'0');
00188 
00189 // enable quick return
00190 $options = null;
00191 $options[] = array('0', __('Disable'));
00192 $options[] = array('1', __('Enable'));
00193 $form->addSelectList('quick_return', __('Quick Return'), $options, $sysconf['quick_return']?'1':'0');
00194 
00195 // enable manual changes of loan and due date in circulation transaction
00196 $options = null;
00197 $options[] = array('0', __('Disable'));
00198 $options[] = array('1', __('Enable'));
00199 $form->addSelectList('allow_loan_date_change', __('Loan and Due Date Manual Change'), $options, $sysconf['allow_loan_date_change']?'1':'0');
00200 
00201 // enable loan limit overriden
00202 $options = null;
00203 $options[] = array('0', __('Disable'));
00204 $options[] = array('1', __('Enable'));
00205 $form->addSelectList('loan_limit_override', __('Loan Limit Override'), $options, $sysconf['loan_limit_override']?'1':'0');
00206

00212 
00213 // enable bibliography xml result set
